actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill for the relief of Oikos, Incorporated, and the Nevada Opera Association, both of Reno, Nevada.

summary.text: Deems two named organizations in Nevada not to have filed valid waiver certificates for purposes of the exemption from employment taxes imposed by the Internal Revenue Code.

titles.title: A bill for the relief of Oikos, Incorporated, and the Nevada Opera Association, both of Reno, Nevada.
